original_text: for it was said to me by the word of the Lord, ‘You shall neither eat bread nor drink water there, nor return by the way that you came.’”
korean_text: 이는 여호와의 말씀이 내게 이르시기를 네가 거기서 떡도 먹지 말고 물도 마시지 말며 또 네가 오던 길로 되돌아가지도 말라 하셨음이로다

sentences.original_text: for it was said to me by the word of the Lord,
You shall neither eat bread nor drink water there,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 그곳에서는 떡도 먹지 말고 물도 마시지 말며,

sentences.original_text: nor return by the way that you came.”
